distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for wireshark fixes the following issues:

- Upgraded Wireshark to version 3.6.24.
- CVE-2024-8250: Fixed NTLMSSP dissector crash (bsc#1229907).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: NTLMSSP dissector crash in Wireshark 4.2.0 to 4.0.6 and 4.0.0 to 4.0.16 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file
